title: A New Report Exposes Massive Deep State Censorship Efforts (Ep 1885)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking report by The Intercept exposing a widespread US government effort to censor people on social media. I also address the growing scandal surrounding the Wuhan lab leak, and the suspicious disappearance of a vaccine specialist. 

News Picks:

A shocking new story about the DHS colluding with Big Tech to monitor your social media. 


A new report bolsters the lab leak theory.

Don’t forget this story about the vaccine researcher from China. 


Politico humiliates itself by calling out “disinformation” it reported. 


This Liz Truss phone hack story is crazy. 


The diesel fuel crisis is getting ugly. 

Harvard Lawyer Struggles to Explain Why Asian Applicants Are Given Lower 'Personal' Scores.
